windows.command: if (git remote | findstr '.github') { git remote set-url base https://github.com/Felipe-Cavalca/.github.git } else { git remote add base https://github.com/Felipe-Cavalca/.github.git }; git fetch base; git merge base/latest-release --allow-unrelated-histories

linux.command: git remote | grep .github && git remote set-url base https://github.com/Felipe-Cavalca/.github.git || git remote add base https://github.com/Felipe-Cavalca/.github.git; git fetch base && git merge base/latest-release --allow-unrelated-histories
